job_tasks.phrase: gather and understand business requirements, translating them into effective CPQ configurations
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly describes the need to understand business needs and translate them into technical configurations, which is a core aspect of business understanding in a consulting context.
This indicates a need to align technical efforts with higher-level business objectives and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Work directly with customers to gather and understand business requirements, translating them into effective CPQ configurations
job_tasks.justification: While primarily business understanding, the 'translating them into effective CPQ configurations' implies the application of technical knowledge to implement solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Handle end-to-end configuration of the CPQ system
job_tasks.justification: Configuring a CPQ system is a form of software implementation and solution building.
This suggests applying AI to enhance existing software workflows, which falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Apply AI tools and techniques to automate repetitive tasks, improve configuration speed, and enhance project delivery
job_tasks.justification: This describes the practical application of AI technologies to improve software development processes and outcomes.

soft_skills.phrase: practical, adaptable problem-solver with a hands-on approach to technology
constantly learning, especially in the realm of AI and CPQ
Work directly with customers to gather and understand business requirements

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes business understanding and the application of AI tools for automation and streamlining workflows within a specific business context (CPQ). While AI is mentioned, the core focus is on configuration and consulting rather than building or fine-tuning generative models themselves.
